nodes.text: The repulsor throwing razor, most often called a Rodian throwing razor by those who used them, was a ranged blade weapon produced by Rheshalva Interstellar Armaments and most often used by Rodian bounty hunters. These weapons were equipped with a repulsor engine to further increase their range. This sometimes allowed for the installation of retrieval devices, endowing them with a "Boomerang effect."
Invented by Rodian weaponsmiths, the weapon's aerodynamic shape allowed for incredible accuracy.
